sentences.en: Access International books standby flights from New York to Europe.
sentences.cn: 全球通达公司可以预订从纽约到欧洲的剩余机票。

sentences.en: Access is by means of a small door on the right.
sentences.cn: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

sentences.en: Access to the papers is restricted to senior management.
sentences.cn: 只有高级管理层才有权查阅这些文件。

sentences.en: Access was via a narrow archway.
sentences.cn: 通道入口是一道狭窄的拱门。

sentences.en: From there you feed electricity into the grid and you can access any power outlet and feed your battery.
sentences.cn: 再把电能输入到电网里，这样你就能进入任何能源输出口，然后给你的电池充电。

sentences.en: He has a security clearance that allows him access to classified information.
sentences.cn: 他获得了安全许可，可以接触机密信息。

sentences.en: How do I access my app scripts?
sentences.cn: 我如何进入我的程序脚本？

sentences.en: Mr Dennis said he had requested access to a telephone.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯先生说他已经请求使用电话。

sentences.en: My ex-wife deliberately sabotages my access to the children.
sentences.cn: 我的前妻蓄意阻挠我见孩子。

sentences.en: She was refused access to her children.
sentences.cn: 她被禁止探视她的孩子。

sentences.en: Some banks charge if you access your account to determine your balance.
sentences.cn: 有些银行对查询账户余额要收费。

sentences.en: The Commissioner has absolutely unrestricted access to all the files.
sentences.cn: 特派员可以随意查阅所有文件。

sentences.en: The country has no access to foreign loans or financial aid.
sentences.cn: 该国得不到任何外国贷款或经济援助。

sentences.en: The facilities have been adapted to give access to wheelchair users.
sentences.cn: 这些设施已经改造过以方便轮椅使用者进入。

sentences.en: The home is situated within easy access of shops and other facilities.
sentences.cn: 房子位置便利，距离商店及其他设施都不远。

sentences.en: The Mortimer Hotel offers easy access to central London.
sentences.cn: 从莫蒂默旅馆去往伦敦市中心交通近便。

sentences.en: The police managed to gain access through an upstairs window.
sentences.cn: 警察设法从楼上的一扇窗户进入了屋子。

sentences.en: The snowcoach concept in Yellowstone provides low-impact, low-pollution access.
sentences.cn: 在黄石公园里使用雪车这一想法，为人们提供了一种对环境低影响、低污染的游览方式。

sentences.en: There is no vehicular access.
sentences.cn: 不通车。

sentences.en: Users can access their voice mail remotely.
sentences.cn: 用户可以远程获取语音邮件。

sentences.en: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.cn: 村民们说这个围栏将限制公众进入山区。

sentences.en: We’re trying to improve access for disabled visitors.
sentences.cn: 我们正在设法给残障访客的出入提供便利。

words.tran_cn: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的

phrases.tran_cn: 【计算机】远程访问(通过电话线路或电子链路从本机访问另一计算机的文件或系统)
【计算机】拒绝访问(被拒绝访问某一计算机程序或网络)
宽带接入；宽频存取；宽带通信
(某地)容易进入；(某人)容易接近
自由访问；自由存取；自由入口
可以到达；可以使用；有接触(或进入、使用)的机会(或权利)
市场准入；进入市场；开放市场

trans.tran_cn: 入口，通道，（使用或见到的）机会/权利
trans.tran_en: the right to enter a place, use something, see someone etc

trans.tran_cn: 访问，存取（计算机信息），到达，进入，使用
trans.tran_en: to find information, especially on a computer

trans.tran_cn: 存取； 获取计算机数据
trans.tran_en: to find information, especially on a computer
